messages.title: YOUR VOTE WILL BE THE DIFFERENCE
messages.content: Stewart, you have the power to stop Ed Miliband and the SNP. You can do it by voting Conservative in Hastings and Rye.

messages.title: WE'VE COME A LONG WAY SINCE 2010
messages.content: Five years ago, the Labour Minister in charge of spending taxpayers' money left us a note saying: 'I’m afraid there is no money'.

messages.title: ED MILIBAND AND THE SNP WILL COST YOU
messages.content: Ed Miliband would lead a weak and chaotic government. And this isn’t just because he and Labour haven’t learnt any lessons on the economy since leaving behind that note five years ago.

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Ed Miliband, Nicola Sturgeon, Alex Salmond
mentions.tacticalSituation: Hastings and Rye is one of the handful of marginal seats that will decide who governs Britain. If the Conservatives hold places like Hastings and Rye, we will win around 20 more seats to form a majority government – and keep the SNP out of Downing Street.

issues.economy: The note of 'no money left' under Labour; Five years of Conservative work has made the UK one of the fastest growing major economies in the world.

endorsements.endorsement: P.S. Stewart, please give me your support by voting Conservative on Thursday. You will be backing the competent team who have built a stronger economy and have a clear plan to keep going.

quotes.text: Stewart, don't risk everything we have achieved over the last five years. The only way you can stop Ed Miliband and the SNP taking us back to square one is to vote Conservative here in Hastings and Rye.
